roleset.name: to load or burden
roleset.note: SADDLE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls butter-9.9, equip-13.4.2-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from saddle.01-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Consequently , Mr. Lawson saddled Mrs. Thatcher with a record trade deficit , renewed inflation and high interest rates -- three political failures in a row .
example.arg: with a record trade deficit , renewed inflation and high interest rates -- three political failures in a row
